alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range; Ventura County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 03 at 3:04AM PDT until April 05 at 9:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 PM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. Isolated gusts to 65 mph Monday night through Tuesday evening. * WHERE...Ventura County Mountains and Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 9 PM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range; Ventura County Mountains
